column2: This decision will send an event for each vassal to choose which to release if not all of them.
Just put the fries in the bag, puppet
Can we go now? (read the tooltip to see which nation this is)
Bring the Persians into the fold officially, big wins!!
Secure our position at the doorstep of India, maybe we could learn a thing or two from the Mughals. . .
Our expeditions into Central Asia have drawn us closer to the people currently persecuted by the Qing, perhaps we could convince them in a new mandate.
We will strike into Prussia Proper so we may secure our control over Poland!
We will strike into Galicia so we may secure our hold over Ukraine!
We will strike into Norway so we may easily bypass the Danish Belts!
SO MUCH WIN!! Lets keep it up
SO MUCH WIN!! Lets keep it up
SO MUCH WIN!! Lets keep it up
In order to host the biggest, best party on the Pacific, we need the ports to bring in the tourists and drinks!!!
We can't forget about our brothers across the Strait! Maybe we can hook them up properly for once and get that colony on its feet! First, a little R&R. .
A Pacific Fleet will require many guns and shipbuilders to keep the party going. Vladivostok offers the perfect location to ship-in resources to develop these industries.
When the Americans and British discussed their borders on the Pacific, there was someone they forgot to ask. We will correct this error!

Our officers have come to us with the breakthrough that they should just put the recently developed super-howitzers onto our boats in order to claim dominance over the Pacific. They would certainly move quicker on water atleast.
All the European and even some Asian nations have been dreaming of claiming the islands of the Pacific. We should get their bright and early since we cant seem to be friends.

We finally made it, all the pieces are together for the world's greatest rager. From Vladivostok and Port Arthur to Oregon and California, the world will be reminded that no one can do it like Russia!.

Get your motor running, California Interstate 1, Pacific Coast Party, If you got to work today, Get yourself a new vocation, Pacific Coast Party, You don't have to mind father time, mother nature, Get yourself in line, take your time, And watch it slip away, Just quit your bitching, bite your tongue, Save it for a rainy day, son, Pacific Coast Party, Get your ticket pack your bags, Come and join the celebration, Pacific Coast Party, If you wanna find peace of mind come and get it, Get yourself in line take your time, And watch it slip away, Pacific Coast Party, Hey, I heard somebody say, Work harder than you play, But I never missed a single day's party, Word, I never heard a word, I turned the other way, Pacific Coast Party.
Schlawgga think he going free! is this true?
Have each vassal send us an event to release or not
Reduce Factory Inputs and Increase Factory Outputs
Promote Craftsmen and Reduce Factory Inputs as well as Increase Factory Outputs
Promote Clerks and Reduce Factory Inputs as well as Increase Factory Outputs
Promote Soldiers and Reduce Factory Inputs as well as Increase Factory Outputs
Reduce Factory Inputs, Increase Factory Outputs, and Increase Mining/Farming Efficiency
Promote Soldiers and Boost Assimilation Rate
Promote Craftsmen and Boost Assimilation Rate
Promote Bureaucrats and Increase Internal Migrant Priority
With the discovery of Phenomenalism, you have begun to explore new methods of controlling your nations thinking.
With the discovery of Experimental Psychology, you have begun to explore new methods of controlling your nations thinking.
With the discovery of Psychoanalysis, you have begun to explore new methods of controlling your nations thinking.
Boosts II Unlock from Experimental Psychology
The Brotherhood has entrusted me. It is time for a harvest. Fields of green. . ..
Peace Through Power will be the slogan to unite Earth!
Serbia has treated us well, but it is time we expand our operation and begin mining Tiberium in earnest. . .
They got away somehow. . . (release the other one by decision if you only lost one puppet).
You need to pay your admin for this to do anything
Our preparations around the source of the heavenly Mandate are complete. With one order, we can begin marching into Manchuria to setup our first of many outposts.
Its the Green its the green its the green you need!!! Who needs Samarkand when you have India Super Power 1920!
We are building the mother of all call centers, Jack! You're gonna have to crack a few whips. . .
ITS COMING HOME! SHES COMIN HOME TO SAMARKAND!

Switch it up!
